## Taxonomy
- **Class:** Reptilia
- **Order:** Crocodylia
- **Family:** Alligatoridae

## Occurrence at DeLuca Preserve
Confirmed in 2025 UF DeLuca BioBlitz (Research Grade)

## Conservation & rarity context
- IUCN: Least Concern; Florida: managed
- **Rarity note:** Large apex predator of freshwater wetlands

## Natural history notes
Recovered after conservation; basks on banks; eats fish, turtles, mammals.
